name: R5-DeviceMetric-R4-DeviceMetric
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 DeviceMetric into FHIR R4

element.display: Measurement, calculation or setting capability of a medical device

target.display: Measurement, calculation or setting capability of a medical device
target.comment: R5 `DeviceMetric` maps as Equivalent to R4 `DeviceMetric`

element.display: Describes the calibrations that have been performed or that are required to be performed

target.display: Describes the calibrations that have been performed or that are required to be performed
target.comment: R5 `DeviceMetric.calibration` maps as Equivalent to R4 `DeviceMetric.calibration`

R5 `DeviceMetric.calibration.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `DeviceMetric.calibration.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`
R5 `DeviceMetric.calibration.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `DeviceMetric.calibration.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `DeviceMetric.calibration.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `DeviceMetric.calibration.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`

R5 `DeviceMetric.calibration.state` maps as Equivalent to R4 `DeviceMetric.calibration.state` - state has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/metric-calibration-state|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/metric-calibration-state|4.0.1 (Equivalent)

element.display: Describes the time last calibration has been performed

target.display: Describes the time last calibration has been performed
target.comment: R5 `DeviceMetric.calibration.time` maps as Equivalent to R4 `DeviceMetric.calibration.time`

R5 `DeviceMetric.calibration.type` maps as Equivalent to R4 `DeviceMetric.calibration.type` - type has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/metric-calibration-type|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/metric-calibration-type|4.0.1 (Equivalent)

R5 `DeviceMetric.category` maps as Equivalent to R4 `DeviceMetric.category` - category has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/metric-category|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/metric-category|4.0.1 (Equivalent)

target.display: black | red | green | yellow | blue | magenta | cyan | white
target.comment: R5 `DeviceMetric.color` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `DeviceMetric.color` - (color failed to compare required binding of http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/color-codes|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/metric-color|4.0.1); color has change due to type change: R5 `color` `code` maps as RelatedTo for R4 `color`
R5 `DeviceMetric.contained` maps as Equivalent to R4 `DeviceMetric.contained`

target.display: Describes the link to the source Device
target.comment: R5 `DeviceMetric.device` maps as Equivalent to R4 `DeviceMetric.source`

target.display: Describes the link to the parent Device
target.comment: R5 `DeviceMetric.device` maps as Equivalent to R4 `DeviceMetric.parent`

R5 `DeviceMetric.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `DeviceMetric.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`
R5 `DeviceMetric.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `DeviceMetric.id`
R5 `DeviceMetric.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R4 `DeviceMetric.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R5 `DeviceMetric.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R4 `DeviceMetric.implicitRules`

R5 `DeviceMetric.language` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R4 `DeviceMetric.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred; language has change due to type change: R5 `language` `code` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R4 `language`

element.display: Indicates how often the metric is taken or recorded

target.comment: R5 `DeviceMetric.meta` maps as Equivalent to R4 `DeviceMetric.meta`

R5 `DeviceMetric.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `DeviceMetric.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`

R5 `DeviceMetric.operationalStatus` maps as Equivalent to R4 `DeviceMetric.operationalStatus` - operationalStatus has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/metric-operational-status|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/metric-operational-status|4.0.1 (Equivalent)

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R5 `DeviceMetric.text` maps as Equivalent to R4 `DeviceMetric.text`

element.display: Identity of metric, for example Heart Rate or PEEP Setting

target.display: Identity of metric, for example Heart Rate or PEEP Setting
target.comment: R5 `DeviceMetric.type` maps as Equivalent to R4 `DeviceMetric.type`

element.display: Unit of Measure for the Metric

target.display: Unit of Measure for the Metric
target.comment: R5 `DeviceMetric.unit` maps as Equivalent to R4 `DeviceMetric.unit`
